column5: Please note that the first intake for this programme will be October 2024.Our Finance and Global Trading programme combines a strong theoretical finance foundation with the development of real-world financial trading skills.In the first two semesters you will build a solid foundation in fundamental finance theory alongside students taking our MSc Finance programme.What really differentiates this programme is the summer 'Global Financial Trading' module delivered by experienced professional traders. You will gain real experience of trading across multiple asset classes and products using industry-standard trading software and live prices.
